title: ScreeningEvent
description: A screening of a movie or other video.

allOf.description: An event happening at a certain time and location, such as a concert, lecture, or festival. Ticketing information may be added via the offers property. Repeated events may be structured as separate Event objects.

videoFormat.description: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).

workPresented.description: The movie presented during this event.
